body.p: Your note of 27th Feby was received during my absence in Kentucky removing my family to this City. I improve my first day at my desk to acknowledge its receipt and thank you for the enclosed commission & instructions &c.
Please find, inclosed herewith the affidavit required by your statute, and also the fee of $5. and believe me

James W. Tate Esq
Asst. Secy of State
Frankfort Ky
